title: Air Fryer Pork Chop Recipes
description: Find pork chop recipes to make in the air fryer, such as Breaded Air Fryer Pork Chops and Keto Pecan-Crusted Pork Chops in the Air Fryer. get the air fryer pork chop recipes here.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE 9 Air Fryer Pork Chop Recipes By Ita Mac Airt Ita Mac Airt Ita Mac Airt is a longtime member of the Allrecipes Editorial team, starting in the original Seattle headquarters as one of the site's first content producers. She went on to manage several of Allrecipes' international websites before rejoining the Allrecipes.com editorial team in 2023. Allrecipes' editorial guidelines Published on September 16, 2021 Close Credits: Bibi In this collection of tasty collection of air-fried pork chop recipes, you'll learn how to cook boneless pork chops in the air fryer so they stay succulent and juicy. You'll also find how to dredge and cook breaded pork chops so that they cook up crispy on the outside, but stay tender inside. Cooking pork chops in an air fryer also speeds up the cooking time, so you can have dinner on the table in a flash! 01 of 10 Breaded Air Fryer Pork Chops View Recipe Save France C Boneless pork chops are seasoned with a Cajun spice mix, then breaded in crushed cheese and garlic flavored croutons. "Play around with different crouton flavors for variety," says recipe contributor France C. 15 Recipes to Try Right After You Get an Air Fryer 02 of 10 Easy Air Fryer Pork Chops View Recipe Save Soup Loving Nicole Center cut pork chops are coated with olive oil, then dredged in a mixture of Parmesan cheese, paprika, garlic and parsley before they are cooked to perfection in the air fryer. You couldn't ask for an easier pork chop recipe! "Delicious," says home cook kelsamic. "They came out very moist, great flavor!" 03 of 10 Keto Pecan-Crusted Pork Chops in the Air Fryer View Recipe Save Bibi The air fryer makes easy work of these nutty pecan pork chops that will suit anyone following a keto lifestyle. Ground cinnamon, cardamom, and cloves pair perfectly with the flavor of the pork. Serve warm, garnished with fresh parsley. "Great juicy pork chops," says home cook Connie Horner. "Loved them!" 04 of 10 Air Fryer Pork Chops (No Breading) View Recipe Save Boneless pork chops are cooked in a sweet and spicy Worcestershire-soy sauce mixture with lemon, garlic, and Sriracha. The cook time is only 20 minutes when you use an air fryer. "I made these with bone-in chops and they came out delicious!" says home cook Maureen D. "I marinated them in the brown sugar mixture for an hour. I will make these again!" 05 of 10 Spicy Air Fryer Pork Chops with Apricot Glaze View Recipe Save Bibi "A combination of chili powder and other herbs and spices make a spicy rub for pork chops," says Bibi. "Brush with a spicy-sweet glaze (featuring apricot preserves, hoisin sauce, ginger, and chili-garlic sauce) in the last 2 minutes of cooking. We enjoyed these chops with simple sautéed zucchini and steamed white rice." 06 of 10 Japanese Air-Fried Pork Tonkatsu View Recipe Save This crispy Japanese-style breaded pork stays tender and juicy on the inside. Serve these delicious chops with steamed white rice, shredded Savoy cabbage, and tonkatsu sauce for a delightful Asian-inspired meal. 20 Easy Japanese Recipes for Quick Weeknight Dinners 07 of 10 Air Fryer Keto Pork Chops View Recipe Save Yoly Boneless pork chops are dipped in egg, coated with a Parmesan-almond flour coating, then spritzed with avocado oil before being cooked in the air fryer until tender-perfect, crispy, and flavorful. Serve with microwaved rice and a green salad for a last-minute dinner with minimal cleanup. 08 of 10 Air Fryer Ranch Pork Chops View Recipe Save France C Pork chops are seasoned with dry ranch salad dressing mix. Feel free to experiment with different varieties of ranch mix to change the flavor completely. "Delicious!" says home cook MissRhythm. "Juicy and flavorful - a hit with the whole family!" 09 of 10 Air Fryer Panko-Crusted Pork Chops View Recipe Save Bibi Brined pork chops are seasoned with fresh rosemary, then coated on all sides with a Panko-Parmesan crumb for tender, crispy pork chops that are a breeze to cook in an air fryer. "We enjoyed these pork chops with potatoes in a cheese sauce and oven-roasted asparagus," says recipe creator Bibi. 19 Recipes That Put Panko to Delicious Use 10 of 10 More Inspiration France C Try one of Our Best Air Fryer Main Dishes for Dinner. Plus, explore our entire collection of Air Fryer Recipes. Cajun Air Fryer Salmon Air Fryer Meatloaf Air Fryer Tacos de Papa Explore more: Recipes Everyday Cooking Cooking by Equipment Air Fryer Was this page helpful? Thanks for your feedback! Tell us why!
